# [Interview #773: SLC Signing Report - Matt Hatch, Entry #12](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=773#12)

#### Matt Hatch

Can someone that enters
*Tel'aran'rhiod*
physically, use the Gap of Infinity? More specifically, if Egwene entered
*Tel'aran'rhiod*
in her physical body, could she access the Gap of Infinity?

#### Brandon Sanderson

MAFO.
